title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details have the following issues:
i. Duplicate name validation should be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns should be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
